General.Name: MK Trend Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Hansaemk Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells women's and men's casual clothes in South Korea and internationally. It sells its products under the PGA TOUR, LPGA, NBA, NBA KIDS, BUCKAROO, TBJ, and ANDEW brands. The company was formerly known as MK Trend Co., Ltd. Hansaemk Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. Hansaemk Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Hansae Yes24 Holdings Co., Ltd.

3.Name: Mr. Jun-Hwan  Kim
3.Title: Chief of Management Supporting Office and Sr. Managing Director
